email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Hope you're doing well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Vessel details: DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. Freight rate is $25/MT, CIF terms. Laycan 1-5 December. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Santos
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $22/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
John Doe
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Loading window is 72 hours, demurrage $15,000/day. Best I can do is $23/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Maria Santos
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the update. Let's proceed at $23/MT. Please send the recap.

Best,
John Doe
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Disch Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: USD 23/MT CIF
- Laycan: 1-5 December
- Demurrage: $15,000/day

Let me know if any corrections needed.

Best,
Maria Santos
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with fixing.

Best,
John Doe
Global Chartering
